meanings.definition: Without any reduction in intensity or strength.
meanings.sent1: The storm raged unabated throughout the night.
meanings.sent2: The fire burned unabated, consuming everything in its path.
meanings.sent3: The toddler's energy seemed unabated as he ran around the park.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm for the project was unabated, driving her to work tirelessly.
meanings.sent5: The cheers from the crowd continued unabated, echoing in the stadium.

meanings.definition: Continuing at full strength or force.
meanings.sent1: The unabated wind howled through the trees, causing them to sway.
meanings.sent2: The team's unabated effort led them to victory in the championship.
meanings.sent3: The unabated growth of the plant surprised the gardener with its speed.
meanings.sent4: His unabated determination to succeed inspired those around him.
meanings.sent5: The unabated flow of water rushed down the waterfall, creating a mesmerizing sight.
